QuestData.Title: Professional Protography
QuestData.Description:
I haven't trained a photographer as good as you... that's still alive, that is. It's a dangerous profession.
Speaking of dangerous, our final target is a large proto-dragon we believe may be one of the next apex predators in this preserve. Let's get up close and personal and take a picture!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Vertical Enhancement Apparatus and photograph the Slumbering Proto-Dragon.
QuestData.RewardText:
So totally unrelated, but you didn't see another camera up there, did you?
You know what? Forget I said anything.

Objectives.Objective: Jump on the Vertical Enhancement Apparatus
